name: Copy pellets
description:
A puzzlescript game about eating pellets and by doing so makes blocks copy themselves.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=39f9dc422a255dbff10a7a655281a57e 

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=39f9dc422a255dbff10a7a655281a57e 

(psst...You can play a secret level after the win screen if you press X when you are on it) 

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
